$ 1450 1887 Queen St. East   
Some Util. Inc.

QUEEN-WOODBINE

This Large 1 bedroom Condo-style apartment is on the Top floor of a 3 storey building. Complete with original hardwood floors, spacious bedroom and walk-in-closet, wood burning fireplace, en suite washer and dryer, with plenty of closet and storage space. Updated design includes condo style open concept feel between living room and kitchen area. Kitchen is complete with new stainless steel appliances and large peninsula with 73" x 39" oak chopping block countertop. Deck off living room. Steps to the lake, boardwalk, Olympic pool as well as Queen St. East shops and restaurants. 24 hour TTC Parking is available. Hydro & hot water extra (Approximately $75/Month). Heat is included in rent. Available April 1st.
